1.title: Brentwood and West Hollywood
1.plot: Pro stager Meridith Baer makes a Tuscan-style property warm and cozy in the premiere of this series.

2.title: Hollywood and Venice Beach
2.plot: A mix of antiques and modern pieces are used to make a historic mansion more appealing to potential young buyers; and Bohemian-style furnishings help maximize the space in a small beach bungalow.

3.title: Pacific Palisades and Los Feliz
3.plot: A cohesive color scheme and rugs are used to make rooms that are long and narrow more visually appealing. Also: Meredith adds some bright touches to a Spanish-style home with windows that are trimmed in bold blue.

4.title: Malibu and Melrose
4.plot: A modern Malibu home with no dining room is staged. Also: A designer gets creative with furniture placement in a Spanish-style abode.

5.title: Bel Air and Valley Village
5.plot: Staging is used to hide the age of an older English Tudor; and Meridith takes three small connected rooms and turns them into a children's suite. Also: A family room is transformed for a homeowner who needs to sell fast.

6.title: Malibu Modern and Malibu Spanish Home
6.plot: Two homes in Malibu, Cal., are transformed by Meridith and her team. Included: An outdoor living room is created on a 2500-square-foot deck; and Moroccan touches are added to a family room.

7.title: Marina Del Rey and Outpost Estates
7.plot: A high-priced condo is given a beach-themed makeover; and an oversized family room is made less awkward by the team.

8.title: Hollywood Hills and Mulholland Drive
8.plot: The staging of a master bedroom proves challenging to Meridith and her team, who also have their hands full removing furniture from a home.

imdb.plot outline: Follow luxury stager Meridith Baer as she and her team completely redecorate homes listed for sale in Los Angeles' high-end real estate market. In hopes of getting her client's homes to sell quickly at top-dollar list prices, she and her team pull from her company's incredible 135,000-square-foot warehouse space - a decorator's dream - full of furniture, accessories and art. Watch as these homes go from raw spaces to completely transformed, glorious showplaces, and learn tips on how to stage your own home to sell.
imdb.title: Staged to Perfection
plot: Follow luxury stager Meridith Baer as she and her team completely redecorate homes listed for sale in Los Angeles' high-end real estate market. In hopes of getting her client's homes to sell quickly at top-dollar list prices, she and her team pull from her company's incredible 135,000-square-foot warehouse space - a decorator's dream - full of furniture, accessories and art. Watch as these homes go from raw spaces to completely transformed, glorious showplaces, and learn tips on how to stage your own home to sell.::HGTV
